text: is a Japanese football player. He plays for Ventforet Kofu. ==Career== One of the best Kansai prospects,http://web.gekisaka.jp/news/detail/?101847-103417-fl from July to December 2013 he has been selected as J. League designated player by Omiya Ardija. Then in 2014 he entered in the regular squad of the Squirrels.http://www.ardija.co.jp/topteam/2015/39.html After the relegation suffered by the club of Saitama in 2014, the new manager Hiroki Shibuya gave him a lot more space on the field. He wears the number 39 because three plus nine makes twelve, which is usually the number associated with fans. ==Career statistics== Updated to 10 December 2018. {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; line-height:90%; font-size:95%; width:70%;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
